The origins of Hero Group can be traced to 1956 when Hero Cycles Limited was established by the Munjal brothers, namely Dayanand Munjal, Satyanand Munjal, Brijmohan Lall Munjal and O. P. Munjal. Hero has since become synonymous with two-wheelers in India. Hero MotoCorp (Formerly Hero Honda Motors Ltd.) is the worlds largest manufacturer of two-wheelers. With innovation at the core of its philosophy, the New Delhi (India) headquartered Hero MotoCorp has been at the forefront of designing and developing technologically advanced motorcycles and scooters for customers around the world. It became the worlds largest two-wheeler manufacturer in 2001, in terms of unit volume sales in a calendar year, and has maintained the coveted title for the past 18 consecutive years. The Munjal family, promoters of BML Munjal University, have a distinguished track record in the fields of primary education, higher secondary education, medical education, skill training and corporate mentoring since 1964. Through its various initiatives, the Munjal family has educated and empowered over 2,00,000 students in India. Dayanand Medical College & Hospital, Ludhiana BCM College of Education, Ludhiana BCM Chain of Schools, Ludhiana BML Munjal Green Meadows Public School, Haridwar Raman Munjal Vidya Mandir, District Gurugram BML Munjal University, founded by the promoters of Hero Group, is a not-for-profit initiative by the Munjal Family aimed at transforming higher education in India by creating a world-class teaching and learning environment. Currently, the university has four schools, namely the School of Engineering & Technology, the School of Management, the School of Law and the School of Economics & Commerce. Through these schools, BMU offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses such as B.Tech, B.Com (Hons), BBA, B.A (Hons.) Economics and MBA. HERO GROUP The US$5 billion diversified Hero Group is a conglomerate of Indian companies with primary interests and operations in automotive manufacturing, financing, renewable energy, electronics manufacturing and education. The Hero Group (BML Munjal family) companies include Hero MotoCorp, Hero FinCorp, Hero Future Energies, Rockman Industries, Hero Electronix and the BML Munjal University. Hero Future Energies, established in 2012, is one of India's leading Independent Power Producer (IPP) with operating plants in the wind, grid-connected solar and rooftop solar. Rahul Munjal is the Chairman & Managing Director of the Company. Rockman Industries was established in 1960 as a bicycle component manufacturer. Today, the company is an industry leader for Aluminium die casting, machined and painted assemblies. Rockman Industries supply components to renowned motorcycle manufacturers and automobile OEMs across the world. Suman Kant Munjal is the Chairman of the Company and Ujjwal Munjal the MD. Hero FinCorp, is the finance arm of the automotive company and is one of the fastest-growing Non-Banking Finance Companies (NBFC) in India. Incorporated in 1991, the company is led by Jt. MD and CEO Abhimanyu Munjal and Dr Pawan Munjal is the Chairman. Hero MotoCorp, the flagship company of the group, manufacturers motorcycles and scooters and holds the distinction of being the worlds largest two-wheeler manufacturer for the past consecutive 19 years. Established in 1984, the company currently has operations in nearly 40 countries. Dr Pawan Munjal is the Chairman, MD and CEO of the Company. Hero Electronix, established in 2015, is the Hero Groups venture into the technology space with a vision to create leading technology businesses emerging out of India. Suman Kant Munjal is the Chairman of the Company and Ujjwal Munjal, the Founder Director. Enquire Now Named after the chairman and founder of the Hero Group, Dr. Brijmohan Lall Munjal, BML Munjal University is engaged in creating, preserving and imparting internationally benchmarked knowledge and skills to a diverse community of students from across the world. BMUs aim is to nurture ethical leaders who are skilled, knowledgeable and have the life skills needed to lead organisations to success. Dr. Brijmohan Lall Munjal Chairman and Founder - Hero Group A world-class university, known for innovative teaching, learning and research environment. BMU seeks to transform higher education in India by creating a world-class and innovative teaching, learning and research environment. Mission BML Munjal University aims to be a leading university for the quality and impact of its teaching, research and linkages with major stakeholders. The focus of the university is to find creative solutions to problems through application of knowledge. The university aims to create a talented community of students and faculty who excel in teaching, learning and research, in a creative and stimulating environment.
